Package io.github.moctave.weftspace

Class Logger.DynamicMessage

java.lang.Object
io.github.moctave.weftspace.Logger.Message
io.github.moctave.weftspace.Logger.DynamicMessage
Enclosing class:
Logger
public static class Logger.DynamicMessage extends Logger.Message
A class that automatically fills in data based on the classes of its arguments. This class fulfills the behaviour of all other extant Message subclasses, and should be used instead of creating new subclasses if possible.

  • Method Details

    • log

      public void log(Object... data)
      Prints this message (usually to System.err) after filling in all appropriate text replacements using the objects provided.
      Parameters:
      data - Data used to fill out the template. Can include strings, DataNode or File objects, or an alternate PrintStream to print to. If no PrintStream is provided, System.err is used. If a LoadedNode is provided, the first such node will be used to generate a line and file reference that is appended to the message.
